Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted, 115th and over regular route due to street blockage near 115th/Eggleston.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Exchange/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and 73rd: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and 73rd: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Illinois Medical District
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Illinois Medical District due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Illinois Medical District due to debris on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
